issue.title: Default values for catalog options and modal css
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

I added default parameters for catalog options.
I also added css for the modal publishing panel for metadata. this css was in the template.

It's commited in svn://www.easysdi.org/easysdi/sandboxes/depth.fr/tp/4.0.1

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.1
